# Load Packages

```{r}
#| label: load_packages
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(forcats)
library(here)
```

# Load Cleaned Dataset

```{r}
#| label: load_cleaned_data

load(here("data", "CKL.rda"))
```

# Descriptive Statistics (by Age Group)

## Pick-Up Location / Sending Facility

```{r}
#| label: describe_pickups

# Make a list of all pick up locations by decreasing frequency
CKL |>
  group_by(PickupLocationDescription, Age_Groups) |>
  count()
```


## Destination / Recieving Facility

```{r}
#| label: describe_pickups

# Make a list of all destinations by decreasing frequency
CKL |> 
  group_by(`Receiving Facility/Destination`, Age_Groups) |>
  count()
```

## Gender

```{r}
#| label: describe_gender

# Count the number of patients by Gender
CKL |> group_by(Age_Groups, Gender) |> count()
```

## Age + Gender

```{r}
#| label: describe_age_gender

# Summarize patient age by gender 
CKL |> group_by(Gender, Age_Groups) |>
       drop_na(Gender, Age_Groups) |>
       summarise(count = n(),
                 mean_age = mean(Age, na.rm = TRUE),
                 median_age = median(Age, na.rm = TRUE),
                 min = min(Age, na.rm = TRUE),
                 max = max(Age, na.rm = TRUE),
                 .groups = "drop") 
```
